course_format: Duration of the course is 42 academic hours.
objectives: To be able to write programs in Rust.
To master the rich set of Rust libraries (crates).
prerequisites: Experienced programmers with good programming background in a language such as C, C++, Java, Go, Perl, Python, PHP, or Ruby

entries: Unsafe Rust - Simple example using unsafe code in Rust
syllabus.title: Rust

target_audience: This is a beginner level course suitable for anyone wanting to use Rust for developing libraries (crates) or applications.
title: Rust Programming
